description:
The year is 2040.
Japanese robot technology is making remarkable progress; they can understand human language, and they`ve even succeeded in developing a humanoid robot that can feel emotions. The setting is a future town on the outskirts of Musashino in the Tokyo area, where humans and robots live together, "New Musashino City". In this town, our main character Ichiro and his friends, as well as some robots, all get along very well. Before these friends appears a mad scientist, Professor K, bent on taking over the world. Ichiro and his robot partner, Kombock, and his other friends stand against him to crush his schemes.
Will they be able to protect the peaceful lives of humans and robots from this evil!? The story of the friendship of Ichiro, Kombock, and their friends begins!!
Source: AnimeNfo
[i]Note: This is a South Korean animated television series created by http://anidb.net/cr38531 [Cinepix]. It first aired first in the US from 11.08.2001 to 26.04.2003, as a 26 episode series, NOT in production order. It later aired in South Korea from 18.04.2002 to 06.05.2004, in proper production order. Episodes are numbered based on Korean production order, and airing dates are given based on the initial US airing.
It finally aired in Japan from 06.10.2003 to 29.03.2004, with the following mapping. See the episode notes for further detail.[/i]

REGULAR.description:
When Connor moves to Bubbletown, he meets Abby, Mong, Chip and Hela (the Botties), but he cannot join their group until he repairs a broken robot - Cubix. However, his work is sabotaged by the evil Dr. K, who plans to steal the precious Solex power source from Cubix.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: 目覚めよ! コンボック

REGULAR.description:
Connor now has a robot of his own, Cubix. Unfortunately, his dad Graham doesn`t feel the same way about robots - and kicks Cubix out of the house. Charles, the mayor`s son, also has a new robot - Quixtreme 5000! While they`re playing cat and mouse at the Botties Pit, a Lectrix shows up - not feeling well. A Lectrix robot goes berserk at the Bubble Town charging station.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: オレの友だちコンボック

REGULAR.description:
When the power keeps cutting out in Bubbletown, Abby decides to take matters into her own hands and catch the culprit. The rest of the Botties join her mission. Soon enough, Dr. K and Kolossal show up and manage to break a gas main - sending the Botties on a race to save Sewwix, get Solex, and save Bubbletown from exploding!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: 地下で事件だ! コンボック

REGULAR.description:
Raska, the beloved spokesperson for RobixCorp, is in Bubble Town shooting a commercial for the new Delishix. The Botties sneak onto the set and Raska thinks Connor would be the perfect star for the commercial and chooses his house as the perfect set. Unfortunately, Delishix is not the perfect robot for the ad and he causes problems on the set. Dr. K shows up as his search for Solex heats up.
Source: bcdb.com

Robots are disappearing in Bubble Town, but the Botties are on the case! The Botties think Dr. K is responsible, but when Dondon narrowly escapes being disintegrated by Disposix, he knows otherwise.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: 御食事はドンドンだって! コンボック

REGULAR.description:
Mong installs a Danger Avoidance Program into Maximix that he gets from his friend Ixtinguix, the Bubble Town Fire Chief. But when Ixtinguix starts acting strangely the Botties suggest that he come to the Annual Robot Inspection at Town Hall for a checkup. The strange behavior turns into flame-throwing.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: 火事だ火消しだ! コンボック

REGULAR.description:
As a hurricane approaches Bubble Town, Connor and his dad have a huge fight, and Connor runs away to Abby`s house. As the storm intensifies, Graham gets worried and goes out to look for his son. Connor now starts to worry about his missing dad and rushes to a highway crash he thinks Graham was in - he doesn`t find him there because Graham`s car is teetering off the side of a cliff!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: チョー大型台風だぞ! コンボック

REGULAR.description:
One of Dr. K`s robots, Attractix, runs away from his lair, infected with Solex, and heads straight for Bubble Town. Attractix begins collecting everything including Dondon! Dr. K chases his AWOL `bot, but the magnetic field of Attractix is too strong even for them!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: マグピョンを助けろ! コンボック

REGULAR.description:
Racing through Bubble Town gets the Botties into trouble again- this time at the Robot Graveyard. A strange robot named Konfusion appears and leads them into the Robot Zoo. Once they get there, they realize they have just set foot into Dr. K`s secret lab!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: Robot Hakaba no Himitsu o Abake! Combock
ロボット墓場の秘密を暴け! コンボック

REGULAR.description:
It`s time for the Annual Robot Grand Prix, promoting technology and beauty, and all the Botties are working furiously on their robots to win! Even Charles is planning to take home the prize with his Quixtreme 5000. Unfortunately, Quixtreme is infected with Solex, and the race to the finish line heats up!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: クリスタニウムの捜索だ! コンボック

REGULAR.description:
While Hela experiments on Solex, Dr. K and his alien boss launch an attack on the Botties pit. Raska shows up expressing her concern for their safety and offers Hela the Robix Corp facilities for her research. The Botties go to Robix Corp, where they are treated like royalty until a new robot goes berserk and put them all in danger!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: Wana ni Ki o Tsukero! Combock
罠に気をつけろ! コンボック

REGULAR.description:
Connor and the rest of the Botties go searching for Cubix, or what`s left of him, only to find that he has been kollected by Dr. K! Thanks to Attractix`s returned memory, they fall into Dr. K`s lair, literally. Once inside, they have to overcome many obstacles until Connor can get to Cubix. He finds him, but only after K has stolen his Solex crystals. Connor also finds out that Raska is an alien and that Nemo has been held prisoner there! Luckily, they fix Cubix and escape the clown tower just as it transformsinto the world`s largest robot!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: よみがえれ! コンボック

REGULAR.description:
Connor, Cubix, and the Botties (in Dr. K`s battle bots) attempt to save Bubbletown from Dr. K`s enormous robot. Eventually, they wind up having to save each other- as Abby gets sucked back inside and Connor runs to her rescue. Eventually, it comes down to Cubix and the big monster, and Cubix`s only chance to win is by transformation. He changes from mode to mode until he overheats and overwhelms his opponent. Unfortunately, he overheats and overwhelms himself, too, and Connor is the only one that can revive him.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: 死ぬな, 友だち! コンボック

REGULAR.description:
Dr. K creates The Ultimate Robot, Cubix`s major adversary in Season 2. When The UR absorbs the powers of other robots and shape-shifts into lookalikes of them, Cubix is initially blamed for the damage that he leaves behind.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: コンボック, 遊園地を守れ!

REGULAR.description:
Tired of being called "shrimp," Chip gains more than height when he straps on some sinister robotic armor. It magnifies his anger and changes him into the Chipinator, a cyborg who needs to be cut back down to size- a tall order indeed, even for Cubix!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: Combock, Takuminator no Bousou o Yamero!
コンボック, タクミネーターの暴走を止めろ!

REGULAR.description:
To rid Bubble Town of its rodent problem, Cubix, Connor and a smelly Exterminator Robot shrink down to invade a mouse colony, but they wind up face to face with a cat who`s a rat- and at the mercy of the big feet of Chip, Mong and Abby, who can`t see them!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: コンボック, ネズミ退治だ!

REGULAR.description:
The kids and Cubix befriend a bunch of invulnerable Crash-Test Dummy Robots, but when the Dummies turn on them, the question becomes: How do you defeat an enemy that you can`t possibly hurt?
Source: bcdb.com

It`s time for the annual Tricoball competition- and the underdog Botties Pit team shocks everyone by taking on the dinosaur robots from the all-new Jurrasix line. But Cubix and gang will need more than teamwork to win once Dark Cubix shape-shifts its way into the contest as Tyrannosaurix- who`s set on making Cubix extinct.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: Combock, Ball Game no Yuusha to Nare!
コンボック, ボールゲームの勇者となれ!

REGULAR.description:
Robix Corp. is about to present its newest robots- like Demolishix, Correctix and Endurix, a colonizer with the ability to instantly transport himself anywhere- to the general public. But things go awry when Dark Cubix shows up and absorbs Maximix, Dondon, even Endurix, and faces off with Cubix.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: コンボック, ロボット博が狙われた!

REGULAR.description:
There`s a spoilsport in Bubble Town`s robot-kite flying contest: jealous Antonio, the new hovering Weather-Control Robot, who feels that the skies belong to him- and who`l defend his place with weather attacks on Cubix and the kids.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: Combock, Arashi o Yobu Takoage Taikai Da!
コンボック, 嵐を呼ぶ凧上げ大会だ!

REGULAR.description:
Dr. K manages to zap all of Bubble Town`s robots into a community sleep and convinces them all to aid him with his nefarious plans. The Botties figure out that the only way to revive their robots without losing them forever is to send Cubix into their bizarre dream world to find a way to wake them all up and show Dark Cubix who`s boss!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: Bubble Town Wishes and EPU Dreams
Combock, Omae mo Yume o Miru no ka?
コンボック, お前も夢を見るのか?

REGULAR.description:
The robot circus is in town! But when the Botties run into (literally) a trapeze robot running for her life, they realize that something isn`t quite right under the big top. During their search to find their new trapeze friend`s lost memory, the Botties discover an underground EPU erasing station. Dr. K is stealing robots and erasing their memories, and this is the last stop before they get shipped to their new home in Kontraption.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: コンボック, サーカス団が怪しいぞ!

REGULAR.description:
The kids find and activate the last of the Mechanical Men- Bubble Town`s earliest robots- outmoded years ago by Nemo`s EPU version. But when the old clunker has trouble adjusting to the modern world, the kids add an EPU to his system. It gives him odd powers and the desire to find his beloved old master- a funny robot-loving boy who became Dr. K.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: コンボック, プロフェッサーKって...!

REGULAR.description:
Kilobot, sick of Dr. K`s shortcomings, strikes out on his own and returns to Robix Corp. to steal the tools necessary for world domination that K failed to obtain. But it`s not as easy as he thought that it would be, and he`s forced to impersonate Maximix to get the job done.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: コンボック, ハイパワーアップだ!

REGULAR.description:
Dr. K sends his army of zombots to Bubble Town to attack- but shortly thereafter, they attack him. Kilobot has his own plans- plans that don`t include Dr. K. Now it`s all-out war as Maximix sacrifices himself and Cubix`s cubes get disseminated among the Zombot army.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: コンボック, 死なないで!

REGULAR.description:
It`s up to Connor, the rest of the Botties, and, surprisingly, Dr. K to restore Cubix and Maximix, ward off the zombot army, prevent all of Bubble Town`s robots from Kilobot`s evil brainwashing, and beat him once and for all!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: Combock, Kimi wa Eien no Tomodachi!
コンボック, 君は永遠の友だち!
Osorete Ita Professor K no Gyakushuu!
恐れていたプロフェッサーKの逆襲!

OTHER: 7:さいころボット_コンボック

titles.title: さいころボット コンボック
